page.title: 03Introduction to the School
page.content:
{FELTON C.OF E.CONTROLLED FIRST SCHOOL { Felton C of E First School is at the North end of Felton Village. It was built in 1973. There are 22 rooms in the school. There is one central hall,4 classrooms and a kitchen. Each 2 classrooms share 4 toilets,1 cloakroom and 1 craftroom. There is a big playing field which is very boggy.When the school was built they had to sink{10}huge metal tubes filled with concrete to support the school and the playground.
In 1985 we planted some hazel and willow trees and we are hoping to make a butterfly garden there. There is a playground 28m square and there are tractor tyres to sit in and markings for games. There is a big sand pit.
